price: ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ យើងបានចង្អុលបង្ហាញគេនូវមាគ៌ាដ៏ត្រឹម ត្រូវ។ គេអាចជាអ្នកដឹងគុណ ឬជាអ្នករមិលគុណ។
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
